name: !4RC4N01D! 2: Retro Edition
description:
Everyone dreams of returning 2007, but no one dreams of returning 1986, and it was then that the legendary game was created! 4RC4N01D! 2: The retro edition helps you remember the atmosphere of that very game straight from the slot machines, 8 bit music, simple gameplay and dozens of hours of fun!
Features:
+10 levels
+ Completely worked out physics
+ Great soundtrack
+ Low price
+Fullscreen support
